welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Upper Providence, where small-town charm meets endless possibilities! Known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly community, we invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wings Field Airport serves all commercial flights and includes a variety of amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Wings Field Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Doylestown Airport serves all domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chestercounty Carlson Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Chestercounty Carlson Airport is primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for Delta and Frontier Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for Alaska and JetBlue Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for Air Canada, British Airways, and Lufthansa.

terminals.name: Terminal F
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for Southwest Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
